data.actual_result: Your crown does not disappears, you need to refresh your client before you can see your crown being gone.
data.short_description: Owner Crown Doesn't Updates in Member List When Hoisting and Giving Admin to a Role
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the owner or yourself (if you are the owner) make the two roles. One for the owner, one for the member. - Make sure the owner gives themselves the role without admin and the member gets admin and hoist. - Observe the Member List when it is done.
